trans-unit.source: The SignedCms class enables signing and verifying of CMS/PKCS #7 messages.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SignedCms aktiverer logger og kontroll av CMS/PKCS #7 meldinger.

trans-unit.source: The Cryptographic Message Syntax RFC specifies the following MIME types and file name extensions for CMS/PKCS #7 messages with these content types.
trans-unit.target: Den kryptografiske meldingen syntaksen RFC angir følgende MIME-typer og filtyper for CMS/PKCS #7 meldinger med disse typene innhold.

trans-unit.source: |Content type|MIME type|Extension| |------------------|---------------|---------------| |envelopedData|application/pkcs7-mime|.p7m| |signedData|application/pkcs7-signature|.p7s.p7c|
trans-unit.target: | Innholdstype | MIME-typen | Utvidelsen | |------------------|---------------|---------------| | envelopedData | application/pkcs7-mime |. p7m | | signedData | pkcs7-program-signaturen |. p7s.p7c|

trans-unit.source: The SignedCms constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren SignedCms oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms> class has the following default property values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms>klassen har følgende standardverdier for egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.ContentInfo%2A>|1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 (data)Length: zero| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.Detached%2A>|Detached state: `false` The content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information.| The default <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType> for signers is SubjectIdentifierType.IssuerAndSerialNumber.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdien | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.ContentInfo%2A>| 1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 (data) lengde: null | | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.Detached%2A>| Frakoblet tilstand: `false` innholdet som er signert er inkludert i CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen sammen med informasjon om signatur. | Standard <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType>er SubjectIdentifierType.IssuerAndSerialNumber for signatarer.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.Detached%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.ContentInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the detached state is `false` (the default), the signed content is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information.
trans-unit.target: Hvis frakoblet tilstand `false` (standard), signert innhold er inkludert i CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen sammen med informasjon om signatur.

trans-unit.source: If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately.
trans-unit.target: Hvis frakoblet tilstand `true`, klienter som ikke kan dekode S/MIME-meldinger kan se innholdet i meldingen fremdeles Hvis det sendes separat.

trans-unit.source: This may be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether the message sender can be verified for authenticity.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være nyttig når et arkivering program arkiverer meldingens innhold om avsenderen kan bekreftes for ekte.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: The SignedCms constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> class by using the specified content information as the inner content.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren SignedCms oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte innhold informasjonen som indre innhold.

trans-unit.source: For the default property values used with this constructor, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen standardverdiene brukes med denne konstruktøren, kan du se <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.%23ctor>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: If the detached state is `false` (the default), the content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information.
trans-unit.target: Hvis frakoblet tilstand `false` (standard), innholdet som er signert er inkludert i CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen sammen med informasjon om signatur.

trans-unit.source: If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately.
trans-unit.target: Hvis frakoblet tilstand `true`, klienter som ikke kan dekode S/MIME-meldinger kan se innholdet i meldingen fremdeles Hvis det sendes separat.

trans-unit.source: This might be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether the message sender can be verified for authenticity.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være nyttig når et arkivering program arkiverer meldingens innhold om avsenderen kan bekreftes for ekte.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"></xref> object that specifies the content information as the inner content of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"> </xref> objekt som angir innhold informasjonen som indre innholdet i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> meldingen.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: The SignedCms constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> class by using the specified subject identifier type as the default subject identifier type for signers.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren SignedCms oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av angitte emne ID-type som standard emne ID-type for signatarer.

trans-unit.source: For the default property values used with this constructor, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen standardverdiene brukes med denne konstruktøren, kan du se <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.%23ctor>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: If the detached state is `false` (the default), the content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information.
trans-unit.target: Hvis frakoblet tilstand `false` (standard), innholdet som er signert er inkludert i CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen sammen med informasjon om signatur.

trans-unit.source: If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately.
trans-unit.target: Hvis frakoblet tilstand `true`, klienter som ikke kan dekode S/MIME-meldinger kan se innholdet i meldingen fremdeles Hvis det sendes separat.

trans-unit.source: This might be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether the message sender can be verified for authenticity.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være nyttig når et arkivering program arkiverer meldingens innhold om avsenderen kan bekreftes for ekte.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> member that specifies the default subject identifier type for signers.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"> </xref> medlem som angir standard emne identifikator for signatarer.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: The SignedCms constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> class by using the specified content information as the inner content and by using the detached state.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren SignedCms oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av angitte innhold opplysningene som indre innhold og ved å bruke frakoblet tilstand.

trans-unit.source: For the default property values used with this constructor, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen standardverdiene brukes med denne konstruktøren, kan du se <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.%23ctor>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: If the detached state is `false` (the default), the content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information.
trans-unit.target: Hvis frakoblet tilstand `false` (standard), innholdet som er signert er inkludert i CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen sammen med informasjon om signatur.

trans-unit.source: If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately.
trans-unit.target: Hvis frakoblet tilstand `true`, klienter som ikke kan dekode S/MIME-meldinger kan se innholdet i meldingen fremdeles Hvis det sendes separat.

trans-unit.source: This might be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether the message sender can be verified for authenticity.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være nyttig når et arkivering program arkiverer meldingens innhold om avsenderen kan bekreftes for ekte.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"></xref> object that specifies the content information as the inner content of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"> </xref> objekt som angir innhold informasjonen som indre innholdet i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> meldingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> object is for a detached signature.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> objektet er for en frakoblet signatur.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: If `detached` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the signature is detached.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `detached` er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, signaturen er frakoblet.

trans-unit.source: If `detached` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the signature is not detached.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `detached` er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, signaturen ikke er frakoblet.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: The SignedCms constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> class by using the specified subject identifier type as the default subject identifier type for signers and content information as the inner content.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren SignedCms oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av angitte emne ID-type som standard emne ID-type for signatarer og innhold informasjon som indre innhold.

trans-unit.source: For the default property values used with this constructor, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen standardverdiene brukes med denne konstruktøren, kan du se <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.%23ctor>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: If the detached state is `false` (the default), the content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information.
trans-unit.target: Hvis frakoblet tilstand `false` (standard), innholdet som er signert er inkludert i CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen sammen med informasjon om signatur.

trans-unit.source: If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately.
trans-unit.target: Hvis frakoblet tilstand `true`, klienter som ikke kan dekode S/MIME-meldinger kan se innholdet i meldingen fremdeles Hvis det sendes separat.

trans-unit.source: This might be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether the message sender can be verified for authenticity.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være nyttig når et arkivering program arkiverer meldingens innhold om avsenderen kan bekreftes for ekte.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> member that specifies the default subject identifier type for signers.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"> </xref> medlem som angir standard emne identifikator for signatarer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"></xref> object that specifies the content information as the inner content of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"> </xref> objekt som angir innhold informasjonen som indre innholdet i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> meldingen.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: The SignedCms constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> class by using the specified subject identifier type as the default subject identifier type for signers, the content information as the inner content, and by using the detached state.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren SignedCms oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av angitte emne ID-type som standard emne ID-type for signatarer, innhold informasjonen som indre innhold og ved å bruke frakoblet tilstand.

trans-unit.source: If the detached state is `false` (the default), the content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information.
trans-unit.target: Hvis frakoblet tilstand `false` (standard), innholdet som er signert er inkludert i CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen sammen med informasjon om signatur.

trans-unit.source: If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately.
trans-unit.target: Hvis frakoblet tilstand `true`, klienter som ikke kan dekode S/MIME-meldinger kan se innholdet i meldingen fremdeles Hvis det sendes separat.

trans-unit.source: This may be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether or not the message sender can be verified for authenticity.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være nyttig når et arkivering program arkiverer meldingens innhold hvorvidt avsenderen kan bekreftes for ekte.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> member that specifies the default subject identifier type for signers.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"> </xref> medlem som angir standard emne identifikator for signatarer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"></xref> object that specifies the content information as the inner content of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"> </xref> objekt som angir innhold informasjonen som indre innholdet i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> meldingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> object is for a detached signature.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> objektet er for en frakoblet signatur.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: If `detached` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the signature is detached.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `detached` er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, signaturen er frakoblet.

trans-unit.source: If detached is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the signature is not detached.
trans-unit.target: Hvis frakoblet er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, signaturen ikke er frakoblet.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: The Certificates property retrieves the certificates associated with the encoded CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen sertifikater henter sertifikater som er forbundet med meldingen kodet CMS/PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> collection that represents the set of certificates for the encoded CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> samling som representerer settet med sertifikater for kodet CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The CheckHash method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CheckHash bekrefter dataintegriteten meldingens CMS/PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: CheckHash is a specialized method used in specific security infrastructure applications that only wish to check the hash of the CMS message, rather than perform a full digital signature verification.
trans-unit.target: CheckHash er spesialiserte metode som brukes i sikkerhetsoppdateringen infrastrukturprogrammer som bare vil se hash-koden for CMS-meldingen i stedet for å utføre en fullstendig digital signatur-bekreftelse.

trans-unit.source: CheckHash does not authenticate the author nor sender of the message because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: CheckHash godkjenner ikke forfatter eller avsenderen av meldingen fordi denne metoden ikke involverer en digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: For general-purpose checking of the integrity and authenticity of a CMS/PKCS #7 message, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckSignature%28System.Boolean%29> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckSignature%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> methods.
trans-unit.target: For generell kontroll integritet og ekte feilmeldingen CMS/PKCS #7, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckSignature%28System.Boolean%29> eller <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckSignature%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> metoder.

trans-unit.source: This method does not provide authentication of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden gir ikke godkjenning av CMS/PKCS #7-melding.

trans-unit.source: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: Et metodekall er ugyldig for objektets gjeldende tilstand.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies all signatures, including countersignatures, on the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kontrollerer alle signaturer, inkludert medsignaturer CMS/PKCS #7-melding.

trans-unit.source: If there are signed attributes included with the message, these attributes are also verified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er signert attributter som er inkludert i meldingen, verifiseres også disse attributtene.

trans-unit.source: If the option is chosen to validate certificates, the entire included portion of the certificate chain is validated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis alternativet er valgt til å validere sertifikater, valideres hele inkludert delen av sertifikatkjeden.

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception if the verification of a digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden oppstår det et unntak hvis kontroll av en digital signatur mislykkes eller eventuelle valideringskrav ikke er oppfylt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether only the digital signatures are verified without the signers' certificates being validated.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om de digitale signaturene er bekreftet uten av signatarene sertifikater valideres.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: If `verifySignatureOnly` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, only the digital signatures are verified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `verifySignatureOnly` er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, bare signaturer er bekreftet.

trans-unit.source: If it is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the digital signatures are verified, the signers' certificates are validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>digitale signaturer er bekreftet, av signatarene sertifikater valideres og til formålene sertifikater valideres.

trans-unit.source: The purposes of a certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation.
trans-unit.target: Av hensyn til et sertifikat regnes gyldig hvis sertifikatet har ingen nøkkelbruk eller nøkkelbruken støtter digitale signaturer eller ikke-avvisning.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: Et metodekall er ugyldig for objektets gjeldende tilstand.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies all signatures, including countersignatures, on the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kontrollerer alle signaturer, inkludert medsignaturer CMS/PKCS #7-melding.

trans-unit.source: If there are signed attributes included with the message, these attributes are also verified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er signert attributter som er inkludert i meldingen, verifiseres også disse attributtene.

trans-unit.source: If the option is chosen to validate certificates, the entire included portion of the certificate chain is validated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis alternativet er valgt til å validere sertifikater, valideres hele inkludert delen av sertifikatkjeden.

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception if the verification of a digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden oppstår det et unntak hvis kontroll av en digital signatur mislykkes eller eventuelle valideringskrav ikke er oppfylt.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object that can be used to validate the certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objekter som kan brukes til å validere sertifikatkjeden.

trans-unit.source: If no additional certificates are to be used to validate the certificate chain, use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckSignature%28System.Boolean%29> instead of CheckSignature.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen flere sertifikater som skal brukes til å validere sertifikatkjeden, Bruk <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckSignature%28System.Boolean%29> i stedet for CheckSignature.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether only the digital signatures are verified without the signers' certificates being validated.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om de digitale signaturene er bekreftet uten av signatarene sertifikater valideres.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: If `verifySignatureOnly` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, only the digital signatures are verified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `verifySignatureOnly` er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, bare signaturer er bekreftet.

trans-unit.source: If it is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the digital signatures are verified, the signers' certificates are validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>digitale signaturer er bekreftet, av signatarene sertifikater valideres og til formålene sertifikater valideres.

trans-unit.source: The purposes of a certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation.
trans-unit.target: Av hensyn til et sertifikat regnes gyldig hvis sertifikatet har ingen nøkkelbruk eller nøkkelbruken støtter digitale signaturer eller ikke-avvisning.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: Et metodekall er ugyldig for objektets gjeldende tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The ComputeSignature method prompts the user to select a signing certificate, creates a signature, and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ComputeSignature ber om at brukeren velger en signeringssertifikatet oppretter en signatur og legger til signaturen CMS/PKCS #7-melding.

trans-unit.source: This method displays a user interface in which you choose signers for this message.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden viser et brukergrensesnitt der du velger signatarer for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: This requires that the current process is running in *user interactive mode*, meaning that the <xref:System.Environment.UserInteractive%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Dette krever at den gjeldende prosessen kjører i *bruker interaktiv modus*, mening som den <xref:System.Environment.UserInteractive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Environment.UserInteractive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A process is normally in user interactive mode unless it is a service process or running inside a Web application.
trans-unit.target: En prosess er vanligvis bruker interaktiv modus med mindre det er en service prosess eller kjører i et webprogram.

trans-unit.source: Signers whose certificates meet the following conditions will be displayed in the list: - The certificate has an associated private key.
trans-unit.target: Signatarer sertifikatene oppfyller betingelsene nedenfor vises i listen:-sertifikatet har en tilknyttet privatnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: - The certificate is within its validity period.
trans-unit.target: -Sertifikatet er innenfor gyldighetsperioden.

trans-unit.source: - The certificate has no key usage or a key usage that supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation.
trans-unit.target: -Sertifikatet har ingen nøkkelbruk eller en nøkkelbruk som støtter digitale signaturer eller ikke-avvisning.

trans-unit.source: Signer certificates are chosen from the My store.
trans-unit.target: Sertifikater for som signerer velges fra det mitt lager.

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security The following permissions are required to display the user interface: - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow?displayProperty=fullName> The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: .NET framework-sikkerhet følgende tillatelser kreves for å vise brukergrensesnittet:- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow?displayProperty=fullName>følgende tillatelser kreves for å få tilgang til nøkkelen signatur:- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: The ComputeSignature method creates a signature using the specified signer and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ComputeSignature oppretter en signatur ved hjelp av den angitte som signert og legger signaturen til CMS/PKCS #7-melding.

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: .NET framework-sikkerhet følgende tillatelser kreves for å få tilgang til nøkkelen signatur:- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref> object that represents the signer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"> </xref> objektet som representerer den som signert.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: Creates a signature using the specified signer and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en signatur ved hjelp av den angitte som signert og legger signaturen til CMS/PKCS #7-melding.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the silent parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.Certificate*> property of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref> object specified by the signer parameter is not set to a valid certificate, this method prompts the user to select a signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for parameteren stille <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.Certificate*>for den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"> </xref> objektet som er angitt av parameteren signerer er ikke satt til et gyldig sertifikat, denne metoden ber om at brukeren velger en signeringssertifikatet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.Certificate*>

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security The following permissions are required to display the user interface: - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow?displayProperty=fullName> The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: .NET framework-sikkerhet følgende tillatelser kreves for å vise brukergrensesnittet:- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow?displayProperty=fullName>følgende tillatelser kreves for å få tilgang til nøkkelen signatur:- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref> object that represents the signer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"> </xref> objektet som representerer den som signert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to prompt the user to select a signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Be bruker til å velge et sertifikat for signering.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: The value of the silent parameter is and a signing certificate is not specified.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den silent parameteren er og et signeringssertifikat er ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: The ContentInfo property retrieves the inner contents of the encoded CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ContentInfo henter indre innholdet meldingens kodet CMS/PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"></xref> object that represents the contents of the encoded CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"> </xref> objektet som representerer innholdet i kodet CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The Decode method decodes an encoded <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> message.
trans-unit.target: Metoden dekod dekoder en kodet <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> meldingen.

trans-unit.source: Upon successful decoding, the decoded information can be retrieved from the properties of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Når vellykket dekoding dekodede kan hente informasjon fra egenskapene til det <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method resets all member variables of the object by using the information obtained from successful decoding.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilbakestiller alle medlemsvariabler for objektet ved hjelp av informasjonen fra vellykket dekoding.

trans-unit.source: Array of byte values that represents the encoded CMS/PKCS #7 message to be decoded.
trans-unit.target: Matrise med byteverdier som representerer kodet CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen som skal dekodes.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: The Detached property retrieves whether the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> object is for a detached signature.
trans-unit.target: Frakoblet egenskapen henter om den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> objektet er for en frakoblet signatur.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"></xref> object is for a detached signature.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms"> </xref> objektet er for en frakoblet signatur.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: If this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the signature is detached.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, signaturen er frakoblet.

trans-unit.source: If this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the signature is not detached.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, signaturen ikke er frakoblet.

trans-unit.source: The Encode method encodes the information in the object into a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kode koder informasjonen i objektet til en CMS/PKCS #7-melding.

trans-unit.source: An array of byte values that represents the encoded message.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med byteverdier som representerer kodet meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The encoded message can be decoded by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.Decode*> method.
trans-unit.target: Kodet meldingen kan dekodes av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.Decode*>metoden.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.Decode*>

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: Et metodekall er ugyldig for objektets gjeldende tilstand.

trans-unit.source: Removes the signature at the specified index of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.SignerInfos*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner signatur i den angitte indeksen i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.SignerInfos*>samlingen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.SignerInfos*>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the signature to remove.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for signaturen til å fjerne.

trans-unit.source: A CMS/PKCS #7 message is not signed, and index is invalid.
trans-unit.target: En CMS/PKCS #7-melding er ikke signert, og index er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexer mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is greater than the signature count minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - eller - index er større enn antallet signatur minus 1.

trans-unit.source: The signature could not be removed.
trans-unit.target: Signaturen kan ikke fjernes.

trans-unit.source: -or- An internal cryptographic error occurred.
trans-unit.target: - eller - internt kryptografisk feil.

trans-unit.source: The RemoveSignature method removes the signature for the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RemoveSignature fjerner signaturen for den angitte <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> object that represents the countersignature being removed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"> </xref> objektet som representerer Medsignaturen blir fjernet.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for et argument var utenfor det tillatte verdiområdet som er definert av metoden kall.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: The SignerInfos property retrieves the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection associated with the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: SignerInfos egenskapen henter den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"> </xref> samling for CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> object that represents the signer information for the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"> </xref> objektet som representerer signerer informasjonen for CMS/PKCS #7-melding.

trans-unit.source: The Version property retrieves the version of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Version henter versjonen av CMS/PKCS #7-melding.

trans-unit.source: The version determines whether the message is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message.
trans-unit.target: Versjonen bestemmer om meldingen er et PKCS #7-melding eller en kryptografisk melding syntaksen (CMS)-melding.

trans-unit.source: CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
trans-unit.target: CMS er nyere overordnet PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: An int value that represents the CMS/PKCS #7 message version.
trans-unit.target: En heltallsverdi som representerer meldingsversjon CMS/PKCS #7.
